G

getFileForResource(String) - Static method in class net.krotscheck.util.ResourceUtil
Convert a resource path to a File object.
getPathForResource(String) - Static method in class net.krotscheck.util.ResourceUtil
Convert a resource path to an absolute file path.
getResourceAsStream(String) - Static method in class net.krotscheck.util.ResourceUtil
Read the resource found at the given path into a stream.
getResourceAsString(String) - Static method in class net.krotscheck.util.ResourceUtil
Read the resource found at a specific path into a string.

I

A marker interface used for Cobertura Coverage annotation.
